review_data.title: Best coffee in town
review_data.content: They have great coffee. It’s really nice to sit outside if the weather permits. Don’t expect food. It’s all a bout the coffee. The outside sitting area in the old square is very inspiring. A cool spot for a coffee stop for tourists

review_data.title: Quality coffee
review_data.content: Yesterday we decided to stop in Zurich while on our way back home, we took a walk along the river and then ended up taking a coffee before boarding our train. The location is ideal, close to the river and in a square with several...More

review_data.title: Excellent hot chocolate
review_data.content: ViCafe Munsterhof is one of the various locations of the ViCafe chains across the city. This location as with all their other spots I have visited has a friendly, helpful staff. Munsterhof has a few tables inside, but on a nice day take a seat...More

review_data.title: Algo nuevo

review_data.title: Ein Genuss!
review_data.content: Der beste Kaffee den ich Take Away in Zürich je hatte! mit eigenem Becher sogar 50 Rappen günstiger!
